title: Will the Van der Poel-Philipsen Bromance Survive Alpecin-Deceuninck’s Milan-San Remo Success?
content:
Trouble in paradise? Philipsen's growing ambition could put strain on leadership strategy with Van der Poel and derail the Alpecin-Deceuninck superduo.

Read the full article at Will the Van der Poel-Philipsen Bromance Survive Alpecin-Deceuninck’s Milan-San Remo Success? on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
